title: League disconnects in loading screen.
body: After this past patch my league disconnects me out of the loading screen right before I get into the game. Nothing loads everything is at 0 my ping, and everyone's percentage that usually tells how much longer they have to connect to the game is 0.  It usually starts me off at a black screen and then I get to the loading screen and after probably 5-10 min it tells me "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again." I tried my luck later and launched up a custom game but instead of the game crashing it was running at 01 fps.  I also had a windows update before I updated to the latest patch.

replies.body: Likely an issue related to content discussed in [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live) thread.  I recommend reading through that and posting there if you continue to have problems.

I've been following this thread and so far people have been sending their dump files in but aren't getting any solutions atm. One of the Riot members told someone to update their driver for their graphics card and I have done that as well as running a repair, restarting my computer, and disabling my firewall. Nothing seems to work right now and more and more people seem to be having the same issue.

Yeah, just reported the same thing in a bug to Riot - I thought it was a recent windows update or something, happened right after patching to 8.12.233. I have been able to get in games since, but it is really spotty; plus I have been noticing a lot of DCs from other players throughout the matches.
Same here, same issue, No idea on how to resolve it.

i've tried all drivers, wouldn't recommend as it took forever, but try your video, sound, display drivers just to be safe. also downloaded hextech repair tool.. didnt help. i've repaired, uninstalled....
